com.kvs.mybatis.sample.dao

Interface DAO<T extends BaseEntity<PK>,PK>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - is the object to be manipulated for CRUD operation.
    PK - is the primary key in the db table/unique identifier of the object. test
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDealDAO, DAOImpl, DealDAO

    public interface DAO<T extends BaseEntity<PK>,PK>
    Interface provides methods for the CRUD operation of objects in Database.
    Author:
    kvs

      • createEntity

        PK createEntity(T t)
        Inserts record into the db table.
        Parameters:
        t - is the object to be inserted into the db table.
        Returns:
        the primary key of the inserted object.

      • deleteEntity

        java.lang.Integer deleteEntity(PK id)
        Deletes record from the db table
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        no of rows deleted.

      • updateEntity

        java.lang.Integer updateEntity(T t)
        Updates a record in the db table
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • createAllEntities

        void createAllEntities(java.util.List<T> list,
                       int batchSize)
        Inserts record into the db table as a batch.
        Parameters:
        list - is the total no of objects to be created.
        batchSize - is the size of the data to be committed to db. Specify 0 for batchsize if batch is not needed.

      • findAllEntities

        java.util.List<T> findAllEntities()
        Selects all records from db table.
        Returns:
        list of all records from db table.
